segments.text: I wouldn't call myself introverted . Sometimes I enjoy being by myself very much . But other times I like sharing activities with others too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I approach things very enthusiastically , I think , and I don ’ t like to leave something half-done . It makes me nervous . I can ’ t concentrate on something else until the first thing is finished .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing for you to be happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For me , this would be having good relationships with my family members . My family has always been very close knit , and we still spend a lot of time together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What basic principles do you apply to your life ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working hard and being frugal are both virtues . I strive to practise these two virtues in my life .
segments.speaker: S2
